ruleset.name: Unnecessary Rules
ruleset.description: The Unnecessary Ruleset contains a collection of rules for unnecessary code.

rule.name: UnnecessaryBlock
rule.description: An unnecessary Block is present. Such Blocks are often used in other languages to introduce a new variable scope. Blocks do not behave like this in ECMAScipt, and using them can be misleading. Considering removing this unnecessary Block.

property.name: xpath
